article_title: “In Defense of Christians” seeks to protect brethren from Egypt to Iraq
article_text:
Active RNS subscribers and members can view this content by logging-in here.

(RNS) "In Defense of Christians," a Washington-based group, wants to press the point that Christianity is endangered in the Middle East -- its birthplace -- and that its survival is in the interests of all nations.

article_metadata.news_keywords: Beliefs, Andrew Doran, Bishop Angaelos, Cardinal Wuerl, Christian, In Defense of Christians, ISIS, Islamic State, religious freedom
